sentences.sContent: Scientists have been charting temperature changes in the oceans.
sentences.sCn: 科学家们一直在记录海洋温度的变化。

words.tran: 图籍未载的；尚未绘入地图或海图的
宪章派；图解专家；宪章运动者

trans.tranCn: 用图说明；制图；记录，跟踪；计划
trans.tranOther: to record information about a situation or set of events over a period of time, in order to see how it changes or develops
information that is clearly arranged in the form of a simple picture, set of figures,  graph  etc, or a piece of paper with this information on it
